connection_error_toast.title: Connection error
connection_error_toast.message_api: The API plugin is not available. Please check the settings in NINA
connection_error_toast.message_api_version: The API plugin is too old. Please perform an update
connection_error_toast.message_tns: The Touch'N'Stars plugin is not available. Please check the settings in NINA
connection_error_toast.message_tns_version: The Touch N Stars plugin is too old. Please perform an update

updates.title: Update available
updates.description: A newer app bundle ({version}) is ready to install.
updates.downgradeDescription: Switch back to the stable version ({version}). This will replace your current beta version.
updates.preparing: Preparing update… please keep the app open.
updates.error: Update failed. Please try again later.

setup.description: Let's get started with a quick setup
setup.check_wki: You can find detailed instructions in our wiki

instanceDetection.noInstanceMessage: No Touch-N-Stars instance found. Please ensure the instance is running and on the same network.
instanceDetection.mdnsAvailabilityHint: mDNS discovery is available on the Android and iOS apps. Use manual configuration when running in the browser.
instanceDetection.modalSubtitle: Select a Touch-N-Stars instance from the list.
instanceDetection.modalEmpty: No Touch-N-Stars instances were found on this network.
instanceDetection.mdnsRequired: mDNS discovery requires running on Android or iOS.
instanceDetection.noFoundMessage: No Touch-N-Stars instances found via mDNS.
instanceDetection.discoveryPermissionHintWrapper: {message} Ensure the app has local network/Nearby Devices access in system settings.

framing.confirmSetTargetMessage: Are you sure you want to set this target as the sequence target?
framing.useNinaCache: Use NINA cache for the target image
framing.infoTargetImage: If the image is only displayed in black, the “Offline Sky Map Cache“ must be set up in NINA or the “use NINA cache” option must be deactivated

settings.title: Settings
settings.infoSetLocationSync: Please set location sync to mount first

imageFile.title: File Name Pattern
imageFile.empty: Tap tokens below to build pattern

help.title: File Name Pattern
help.intro: Build the file name pattern for your captured images. Each token will be replaced by NINA with the actual value when saving.
help.tokensDesc: Tap a token button to add it to the pattern. Tokens like Filter, Date or ExposureTime are replaced by NINA with the real values.
help.separatorsDesc: Use \ to create folder structures. Use _ or - to separate values in the file name. Use "Text" to add custom text like "s" for seconds.
help.cursorDesc: Tap between existing tokens to move the blinking cursor. New tokens are inserted at the cursor position.

keepAwake.title: Keep Screen Awake
keepAwake.description: Prevent the device from dimming or locking while the app is open.

system.title: System Controls
system.info: These actions will affect the entire system
system.confirmShutdown: Are you sure you want to shutdown the system?
system.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to restart the system?

info.title: Info
info.message: The manual filter wheel and the manual rotator can currently only be controlled via NINA. Use the API's “Networked Filter Wheel” for the filter wheel

sequence.resetConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the sequence? This action cannot be undone.

info.message: Unfortunately, your sequence cannot be edited. Not all sequence plugins are currently supported. If you want to help us, let us know on GitHub which plugins you are using.

location_sync.title: Location sync settings
location_sync.confirmationMessage: If 'Location Sync' in NINA is set to 'Prompt', a confirmation window may appear before coordinates are sent to the telescope. To avoid this and allow TNS to automatically set the coordinates, we recommend changing the setting to 'Sync to Telescope'

guider.title: Guider
guider.roiPercentage: ROI Percentage to Find Guide Star (%)

calibrationAssistant.title: Calibration Assistant
calibrationAssistant.info: The Calibration Assistant helps you position the mount optimally for calibration and perform an accurate calibration.
calibrationAssistant.poorCalibration: Calibration could be improved. Try a different position or check your equipment.

slewAndCenter.title: Slew and Center
slewAndCenter.LastSelectedImageSource_wrong: Please select offline sky map as image source in NINA / Framing

RemoveFilter.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this filter? This action cannot be undone.

modal.title: Configure Notifications
modal.description: Please grant permission to receive notifications about sequence events.

outdated.title: Plugin Outdated
outdated.message: The TouchNStars Plugin in NINA is outdated and needs to be updated.

pins.title: PINS Updater
pins.notAvailable: PINS environment not detected. This plugin is disabled.
pins.sambaDescription: Enable or disable network file sharing
pins.stationaryDescription: Enable to scan and connect to local WiFi networks

logs.noIp: Error: No IP address found in settings. Please connect to an instance first.
logs.daemonCheck: Make sure the PINS daemon is running on {ip}:{port}
logs.corsHint: Hint: The server rejected the request method. Check CORS configuration on the server.
logs.noResponse: Network Error: No response received from server.

bahtifocus.title: Bahtinov Mask Analyzer
bahtifocus.subtitle: Capture or load an image to measure focus quality with your Bahtinov mask.

sections.imageSourceHint: Capture a fresh frame, upload a file, or choose an example image to begin.
sections.parametersHint: Enter the optical and camera data used for this exposure to get accurate metrics.

image.previewUnavailable: Preview not available. The analysis still supports this format.

camera.captureFailed: Unable to capture a new frame.
camera.abortFailed: Unable to abort the active capture.
camera.statusDisconnected: Connect a camera to capture frames.
camera.statusLooping: Looping exposures. Capture will repeat until stopped.

overlay.title: Overlay preview
overlay.noImage: Select or capture an image to view the overlay.

results.title: Analysis results
results.failure: Analysis failed. Check the backend response for details.
results.placeholder: Run the analyzer to see focus metrics here.

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: Use a bright star near the target to generate a clear diffraction pattern.
tips.tip2: Ensure the Bahtinov mask is aligned before capturing the image.
tips.tip3: Reuse the suggested angles to stabilize subsequent measurements.

errors.title: Bahtinov analysis
errors.readFile: Unable to read the selected file.
errors.captureLoad: Failed to load the latest capture from N.I.N.A.
errors.exampleLoad: Could not load the example image.
errors.badRequest: The server rejected the request. Please verify the parameters.
errors.mockMode: Bahtinov analysis is not available while the mock API is enabled.
errors.missingServer: Unable to determine the backend address. Check the connection settings.

validation.title: Validation error
validation.fixErrors: Please fix the highlighted errors before running the analysis.
validation.ratioOrAperture: Provide either the focal ratio or the aperture diameter.
validation.allAnglesRequired: Provide all three angles or clear the fields.
validation.imageRequired: Select an image before running the analysis.

logfileCollector.title: Logfile Collector
logfileCollector.intro: Collect latest TNS logs (including debug) and upload them to the configured endpoint.
logfileCollector.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all submission history?

telescopius.title: Telescopius
telescopius.offlineInfo: Loads personal target lists from telescopius.com and stores them locally for offline availability.

landing.title: Telescopius Plugin
landing.subtitle: Bring your target objects from Telescopius.com directly into Touch'N'Stars

whatIsPlugin.title: What is this plugin?
whatIsPlugin.description: Load your saved target objects from Telescopius.com directly into Touch'N'Stars and use them for navigation and framing.

whatIsTelecopius.title: What is Telescopius?
whatIsTelecopius.description: Telescopius is a comprehensive astronomy platform for discovering and planning astronomical observations.

mainFeatures.title: Main Features
mainFeatures.description: Seamless integration between Telescopius and Touch'N'Stars:

features.autoImport: Automatic Import: All target lists at once
features.directNavigation: Direct Navigation: Slew with one click

apiSetup.title: Set up API Key
apiSetup.description: Follow these simple steps to configure the plugin:

step1.title: Create Telescopius Account
step1.description: If you don't have an account yet, register for free:

step2.title: Request API Key
step2.description: Sign in and go to Settings → API for your personal key:

step3.title: Configure API Key
step3.description: When creating the API key, use these settings:

config.name: Name
config.ipLimit: Limit access to these IP addresses

step4.title: Enter API Key
step4.description: Click "Configure API Key" below and enter your key:

security.title: Security
security.description: Your API key is stored only locally on your device and never shared with others. You can delete it at any time.

apiKey.title: Telescopius API Key
apiKey.description: To use Telescopius, you need an API key. You can get one on the Telescopius website:
apiKey.securityNote: The API key is stored on the server and used only for Telescopius requests.

errors.saveFailed: API key could not be saved.
errors.deleteFailed: API key could not be deleted.

targetLists.noListsDescription: No target lists have been found in your Telescopius account yet.
targetLists.noListsHint: Create target lists on telescopius.com and then reload them here.
targetLists.connectionError: Connection to Telescopius failed. The NINA PC needs an internet connection and at least one target list must exist in Telescopius.

webcam.title: Webcam Settings
webcam.snapshotUrlDescription: A snapshot URL is a direct link to a single image from your webcam/IP camera. This URL should return a JPEG/PNG image directly, not an HTML page or stream.
webcam.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all webcam settings?
webcam.configureUrl: Configure snapshot URL and fetch image

toolbar.validSequence: Sequence is valid and can be adopted
toolbar.invalidSequence: Add Target Settings and Smart Exposure to create a valid sequence

confirmations.title: Confirmation
confirmations.clearSequence: Are you sure you want to clear the entire sequence? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.saveAsDefault: Are you sure you want to save the current sequence as default? This will overwrite the previous default sequence.
confirmations.loadBasicSequence: Are you sure you want to load the basic sequence? This will overwrite the current sequence.
confirmations.navigateToSequence: Do you want to switch to the Sequence page now?

startSequence.title: Start Sequence
startSequence.description: Actions executed at the beginning of the session
startSequence.emptyDescription: Add actions to prepare your equipment for imaging

targetSequence.title: Target Sequence
targetSequence.description: Main imaging sequence for your target
targetSequence.emptyDescription: Add imaging actions for your target

endSequence.title: End Sequence
endSequence.description: Actions executed at the end of the session
endSequence.emptyDescription: Add actions to safely shut down your equipment

actions.noConfigurableParameters: This action has no configurable parameters.

coolCamera.name: Cool Camera
coolCamera.description: Cool the camera to specified temperature
coolCamera.durationTooltip: Time to actively cool the camera (0 = cool until temperature reached)

slewToTarget.name: Slew to Target
slewToTarget.description: Navigate to target with different options
slewToTarget.slewModeTooltip: Choose how to navigate to the target

smartExposure.name: Smart Exposure (Imaging)
smartExposure.description: Intelligent exposure sequence with dithering and triggers

warmCamera.name: Warm Camera
warmCamera.durationTooltip: Time to actively warm up the camera (0 = warm to ambient temperature)

actionLibrary.title: Action Library
actionLibrary.description: Click to add actions to containers

jsonPreview.previewDescription: Preview and download your sequence as a JSON file

targetSearch.searchDescription: Search for deep-sky objects, planets or stars and automatically adopt the coordinates
targetSearch.placeholder: Enter object name (e.g. M31, NGC 1234, Mars)...

platesolveplus.title: PlateSolvePlus
platesolveplus.subtitle: Remote PlateSolvePlus Console for your alternative Platesolve Camera V2

preview.cache_hint: Cache-busting enabled (?t=). Server also sends Cache-Control: no-store.

actions_help.solve_sync: platesolve and sync the mount (requires mount connected).
actions_help.center_solve: platesolve and center the target (requires mount connected + a calibrated offset).
actions_help.solve_sync_text: platesolve and sync the mount (requires mount connected).
actions_help.center_solve_text: platesolve and center the target (requires mount connected + a calibrated offset).
actions_help.target_solve_text: Slew to Target + Center (reqauires mount connected + Target set in Stellarium in Framing Assistant).

settings.values_from_backend: These values come from the backend settings endpoint.

config.token_hint: Sent as header X-PSP-Token (matches the PlateSolvePlus API host).

offsets_help.text: Calibrate creates/updates the guider-to-main offset model. Reset clears all offsets.

secondary_setup.title: Secondary Camera Setup
secondary_setup.subtitle: Driver selection, connection and native ASCOM setup dialog

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: Choose the ASCOM driver to use as secondary camera.
driver.label: Driver

buttons.driver_setup_title: Open native ASCOM setup dialog on host

tip.prefix: Tip: If you changed settings in the driver setup dialog, click

livestack.not_available: Livestack was not found. Please install the Livestack plugin in NINA first.
livestack.beta_note: This plugin is still under development and may contain some errors!
livestack.start_and_select_filter: Start livestack and select a filter to see images
livestack.no_filters_available: No filters available for this target

shortcuts.title: Sequence-Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Quick access to load and start N.I.N.A sequences
shortcuts.noShortcutsDescription: Create shortcuts to quickly load your favorite sequences
shortcuts.autoStartDescription: Automatically start the sequence after loading
shortcuts.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{phrase}"? This action cannot be undone.

observationPlaner.title: Observation Planner
observationPlaner.subtitle: Favorites with preview + altitude map for tonight (location-based)

sections.topForWindow: Top targets for selected time window

location.title: Location
location.hintNoLocation: Note: Without a location, altitude/direction filters & charts cannot be computed.

cache.useNinaCache: Use NINA cache for target image
cache.hint: Loads DSS/target picture via TNS WebAPI. Cache toggle controls useCache.

tooltips.filterAzSector: Filter by bestAzDeg (azimuth at highest altitude within window)

errors.noSequenceAvailable: No sequence available, load Sequence first
